pullrequest.title: Fix for finding correct local ip

content.raw:
We should also allow the user to override with a hostname, e.g., `GAZEBO_HOSTNAME`.  If both `GAZEBO_HOSTNAME` and `GAZEBO_IP` are set, have `GAZEBO_HOSTNAME` win, to match [ROS's behavior](http://ros.org/wiki/ROS/EnvironmentVariables#ROS_IP.2BAC8-ROS_HOSTNAME).

This feature could be ticketed and added in a separate pull request.
content.html:
We should also allow the user to override with a hostname, e.g., GAZEBO_HOSTNAME. If both GAZEBO_HOSTNAME and GAZEBO_IP are set, have GAZEBO_HOSTNAME win, to match ROS's behavior.

This feature could be ticketed and added in a separate pull request.
